alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 08 at 4:02AM MST until January 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Otero County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snowfall amounts and impacts due to the blizzard conditions will be south of Highway 50.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
